name: weathersensors-frontend
description: webinterface for displaying collected sensor- weather-data

scripts.test: (cd resources/js && browserify AppCaller.js -o frontend.js && browserify AdminAppCaller.js -o frontend-admin.js) & mocha --exit
scripts.browserify: cd resources/js && browserify AppCaller.js -o frontend.js && browserify AdminAppCaller.js -o frontend-admin.js
scripts.start: (cd resources/js && browserify AppCaller.js -o frontend.js && browserify AdminAppCaller.js -o frontend-admin.js) & node src/router.js
